actions.name: Low Blow

cost.trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

Effect: Connection - Feint Attack. The the user freely moves up to and using the Movement Score of their choice, and uses Feint Attack, which has [Flinch 3] until resolved.
